items.ja: Did he mean it? Jaja scores spectacular winner to send Pafos into Champions League
items.en: Did he mean it? Jaja scores spectacular winner to send Pafos into Champions League
items.text_for_match: Did he mean it? Jaja scores spectacular winner to send Pafos into Champions League Pafos substitute Jaja scores a brilliant late winner to secure a 3-2 aggregate win against Red Star Belgrade in their Champions League play-off, securing the Cypriot's side's place in the the league phase of the tournament for the first time in their history.
